correspondence.message: I am a M.Sc. Informatik student and would like to start writing my thesis. I have two questions: Is it possible to do the thesis with an advisor from another department, such as the School of Management? What are the requirements that my thesis must satisfy?

Yes, the supervisor can be from any school, but the examiner must meet specific criteria. The requirements your thesis must satisfy will be agreed upon with your examiner and are highly individual, depending on the topic of your thesis. For more information, you can visit: https://www.cit.tum.de/en/cit/studies/students/thesis-completing-your-studies/informatics/
